hadiths.text: Narrated Nafi': That Ibn 'Umar said: "When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would wear an 'Imamah would hang between his shoulders." Nafi' said: "Ibn 'Umar would hang his 'Imamah between his shoulders." 'Ubaidullah said: "And I saw Al-Qasim and Salim doing that." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Gharib. And there is something on this topic from 'Ali. And this Hadith of 'Ali about this is not correct due to its chain

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي سَدْلِ الْعِمَامَةِ بَيْنَ الْكَتِفَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: About Hanging The 'Imamah Between The Shoulders
